info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 3 at 1:33PM CDT until June 3 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita KS
info.description:
FFWICT
The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Sedgwick County in south central Kansas...
* Until 545 PM CDT.
* At 133 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for along and east of I-135 in downtown Wichita into East Wichita. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wichita, Andover, Haysville, Bel Aire, Eastborough, East Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base, Northeast Wichita, South Wichita, Jabara Airport and Oaklawn.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don't drown.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR ALONG AND EAST OF I-135 IN DOWNTOWN WICHITA INTO EAST WICHITA
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 5:45 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 5:45 PM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR ALONG AND EAST OF I-135 IN DOWNTOWN WICHITA INTO EAST WICHITA
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 5:45 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 5:45 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
